summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1413, for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue South, to the City of Seattle, from Yesler Way to King Street, by constructing sewers therein, together with appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15326 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
